channelOptionAll.name: all
channelOptionAll.description: Toggle channel from logging all log types

ignoreOptionTarget.name: target
ignoreOptionTarget.description: Targets are people who are doing the action

messageContentOption.name: content
messageContentOption.description: Add or remove a message from the ignore list

ignoreOptionMessage.name: message
ignoreOptionMessage.description: Messages with this exact content are not recorded to the serverlog

ignoreOptionExecutor.name: executor
ignoreOptionExecutor.description: Executors are people carrying out the action

ignoreOptionsChannelChannel.name: channel
ignoreOptionsChannelChannel.description: Add or remove a channel from the ignore list

ignoreOptionChannel.name: channel
ignoreOptionChannel.description: Messages in this channel are not recorded to the serverlog

spoilersOption.name: spoilers
spoilersOption.description: Spoiler all media sent to the serverlog
